H0.text: Plants forming new buds is the best sign that the fall season has begun.

H1.text: Sun shining on flowers is the BEST sign that the fall season has begun.

H2.text: Grass being wet in the morning is the best sign that the fall season has begun.

H3.text: Leaves changing color on trees is the best sign that the fall season has begun.

A4.text: One of its main features in temperate climates is the striking change in colour of the leaves of deciduous trees as they prepare to shed.
